price: 35. Si se les decía (a los idólatras de La Meca) que no había nada ni nadie con derecho a ser adorado excepto Al-lah, se llenaban de arrogancia
arabic: إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُوٓاْ إِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمۡ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ يَسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: innahum kānū idhā qīla lahum lā ilāha illā al-lahu yastakbirūna
